name: The Snowman Loves the Amazing Shapes
name_original: The Snowman Loves the Amazing Shapes
description:
This is a short puzzle game with a simple gameplay. 9 levels are in it. 

Each special shape has its counterpart. You need to help the Snowman to pull each special shape into its counterparts. Some blocks are pushable. You need to help the Snowman to push them to ? and !.  

Keyboard Guide
cursor keys: movement
spacebar+cursor keys: pull
i: increase background music volume
d: decrease background music volume
w: windowed mode or full screen mode
s: save game
l: load game
r: restart game
c: character selection 

The game was made by FFSLDM(me). It is a free game.
